__e: Miss Holt and I will pose as lovers strolling among the boats.
And Miss Holt and I will take care of the whole thing, all right?
He asked for you, then Miss Holt.
Miss Holt, do you have any idea what this means to me?
I couldn't say no after all the wonderful things I said about you and Miss Holt.
If Miss Holt doesn't have it, and neither do you, where is the painting?
Miss Lemon, can I have a word with you, please? Ohh.
Put it this way, Miss Lemon, it's not going to be very easy breaking it to Poirot.
- I'll talk to Miss Lemon if you like.
If that's what it takes to be the hero the people need yes, Miss Lane, I am.
I'm not very good with... oh, you will be, you will be, Miss Lane.
And I suppose what I'm trying to say, Miss Lane, is I like you.
You said something about Miss Watson was going to give you a ride home?
But you told me you killed Miss Watson.
You'll just think of me sometimes.
Until this evening, I'd not had the honour of being acquainted with Miss Price.
If you do and my estate is lost because of it, something may come over you, Miss Price, like a thief in the night, which may not be quite so agreeable.
I think your Miss Price leads you a merry dance.
Have you ever known Miss Fisher to do anything she didn't want to do?
Teach them what you want, Miss Fisher. The girls have worked so hard and are so looking forward to it. We can't disappoint them.
I'm s... I'm so sorry, Miss Fisher, but I didn't know where else to go.
